info.brief_description: Endless foot growth fun! Humans / Anthros options
info.description:
Make the feet or footpaws of your favorite characters, friends, etc grow bigger! Then have fun playing with them however see fit, so long as you fallow these simples rules;

No; Gore, Scat, Watersports, vore.

Keep it foot fetish orientated, though other kinks are allowed.

There is a Normal / Human option, and a Furry option. Please put characters in the correct chapter!

Have decent English. None-English writers are allowed, but run it through Google Translate or something first

Only character description / option chapters can be super short. Otherwise, try to write as much as you can.

Never close off the character selection chapters, more characters to play with the better!

Growth can be caused by any way you want, from potions to rays, crazy machines, inflation, etc.

Swears are fine, but keep out any racial / sexist slurs or texts please. This is for fun kinky writting, not politics and hate crap.

Have Fun! (GP available for decent or amazing adds!
info.pretty_title: Foot / Paw Growth Fun (Gift points too)
